page.title: 16Tourism in Retford
page.content: The{Retford Heritage Trail}is a walk around the important historical features of the town and includes;North's chemist c.1779 one of the oldest chemists in England,Ye Olde Sun c.1752-55 established to meet the demands ot travellers passing through. {Amcott Hs.}reflects the historical prosperity of the market town and still retains it's large garden.The building houses{Retford's Museum}and Social Security Dept.now. Retford's churches,dating from the 13th century are attractions not to be missed,especially St.Michael's church bell tower. Retford has its own{Tourist {Information}office.This year record catches have drawn more fishermen than ever to the{Chesterfield}Canal.It also attracts{pleasure craft}users.The "Spitfire"provides rides on the canal.
